args.canonical_rel_desc: Links a property, attribute, or quality node to the entity that bears this property.
args.justification: This relation links a quality node ('complexity of black holes') to its bearer ('black holes'), matching the same semantics as other 'is_property_of' instances in this chunk. Normalizing from 'is_quality_of' to 'is_property_of' and aligning rel_cls to 'entity_property_relation' and rel_cls_group to 'ATTRIBUTE' ensures consistent handling of property→entity relations across the KG.
args.remark: Standardized this quality relation to use the same property→entity predicate and class as other similar relations in the black hole property schema.
